title: Grifters, believers, grinders, and coasters
dot:
digraph engineer_types{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];subgraph cluster_1{label="Types of Engineers";style=dashed;Grifters[label="Grifters
- Play to win
- Understand organizational power
- Not good at changing culture
- Good for large projects"];Believers[label="Believers
- Value good work
- Focus on user experience
- Often under-promoted
- Good for customer focus"];Coasters[label="Coasters
- Chill and relaxed
- Avoid unnecessary work
- Maintain calm environment
- Good for flexibility"];Grinders[label="Grinders
- Always ready to work
- Love mechanics of the job
- Can burn out hard
- Good for fast-paced tasks"];}Grifters->Believers[label="Need to work together"];Believers->Grifters[label="Selective collaboration"];Grinders->Coasters[label="Need to understand each other"];Coasters->Grinders[label="Be understanding of stress"]; Summary[label="Summary
- Grifters need Believers
- Believers need selectivity
- Grinders need Coasters
- Coasters need understanding"];Summary[shape=ellipse, style=dotted]; Grifters->Summary;Believers->Summary;Grinders->Summary;Coasters->Summary;}
